pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, April 4, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the Emir of Qatar, Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet virtually with Northwest Territories Premier Caroline Cochrane, Nunavut Premier P.J. Akeeagok, and Yukon Premier Sandy Silver. Minister of National Defence Anita Anand will also be in attendance.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will receive a COVID‑19 briefing from Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Australia, Scott Morrison.
